attributes.action: If formulae isnt given in GCSE maths, students will avoid school as a protest.
attributes.background: If the initial petition doesn't go through this should appeal the the Secretary of Education that what they are doing with Maths papers in GCSE'S are wrong. We may try to get students to have a peaceful protest outside House of Commons

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on students, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179617
